key_risks: Distribution sustainability concerns due to rising interest rates and higher capital costs
Heavy dependence on parent company NextEra Energy for asset acquisitions and operational support
Regulatory and policy risks tied to renewable energy incentives and standards
Market volatility and competition in the renewable energy sector
ESG and regulatory risks highlighted by Fitch Ratings
controversies: Potential for a substantial distribution cut impacting income-focused investors
Questions about independence and ability to source third-party projects
environmental_issues: Exposure to regulatory changes impacting renewable energy policies
social_issues: Community support and environmental respect emphasized in sustainability commitments
governance_issues: Dependence on parent company raises governance concerns
